description:
Make history! As a powerful commander, enter the field of battle and conquer the Chinese Empire with some exciting Mahjong puzzles. Immerse yourself into the stunning 3D environment and experience a new dimension in board games.

Solve over 160 tricky Mahjong puzzles.

Use special power-ups like Whirlwind or Earthquake to help you.

Create and play an infinite number of puzzles in the level editor.

Experience the thrilling and Entertaining story.
name:
Mahjong 3D
Warriors of the Emperor
